materials.raw_text:
Barium (Ba) - 20 g 
 Lithium (Li) - 1 g 
 Magnesium (Mg) - 1 g 
 Niobium (Nb) - 8 g

sourcing.instructions:
Barium can be sourced from chemical supply companies or laboratories. 
 Lithium is available at chemical suppliers or online specialty stores. 
 Magnesium can be found at metal suppliers or online. 
 Niobium can be sourced from specialty metal suppliers or online markets.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out the specified amounts of each material using a precise scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine the barium, lithium, magnesium, and niobium powders. 
 3. Use a mortar and pestle or a ball mill to thoroughly mix the powders until a uniform consistency is achieved.
